ptolemy.homer.kernel

Class HomerMultiContent

  • java.lang.Object
    • ptolemy.homer.kernel.MultiContent<TabScenePanel>
      • ptolemy.homer.kernel.HomerMultiContent

  • public class HomerMultiContent
extends MultiContent<TabScenePanel>
    The class responsible for displaying the content area and managing the tab creation, removal, and event propagation.
    Since:
    Ptolemy II 10.0
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Peter Foldes
    Accepted Rating:
    Red (pdf)
    Proposed Rating:
    Red (pdf)

    • Constructor Detail

      • HomerMultiContent

        public HomerMultiContent(TabScenePanel contentPrototype)
        Create a content container.
        Parameters:
        contentPrototype - A prototype of the content area. This prototype is used to create multiple content areas on demand.

      • HomerMultiContent

        public HomerMultiContent(TabScenePanel contentPrototype,
                         CompositeEntity model)
                  throws IllegalActionException,
                         NameDuplicationException
        Create a content container.
        Parameters:
        contentPrototype - A prototype of the content area. This prototype is used to create multiple content areas on demand.
        model - The model to be parsed.
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException - If any of the elements can't be placed into a content area.
        NameDuplicationException - If multiple elements exist with the same name. Element names within a workspace must be unique.

        tabTag - The tag of the target tab.

      • addTab

        public java.lang.String addTab(ComponentEntity topLevel,
                               java.lang.String tag,
                               java.lang.String name,
                               ContentPrototype content)
                        throws IllegalActionException,
                               NameDuplicationException
        Add a tab with the provided parameters.
        Overrides:
        addTab in class MultiContent<TabScenePanel>
        Parameters:
        topLevel - The container containing all tab definitions. If the container does not have the attribute that contains all tab definition information, it will be created.
        tag - The tag identifier used for the content area.
        name - Name of the tab. Can be used for visualization.
        content - The specific content for the new tab.
        Returns:
        The tag identifier of the tab.
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException - If the name coincides with an attribute already in the container.
        NameDuplicationException - If the attribute is not of an acceptable class for the container, if the name contains a period, or if a content area with the same tag already exist.

        Clear the contents, but keep all the listeners attached.

               throws IllegalActionException
        Rename a content area at a given position.
        Overrides:
        setNameAt in class MultiContent<TabScenePanel>
        Parameters:

        text - The new title of the tab.
